Module core.java.helper
Package com.pineframework.core.helper

Class DateUtils

java.lang.Object
com.pineframework.core.helper.DateUtils
public final class DateUtils extends Object
The DateUtils class provides utility functions for date.

    • createFormat

      public static com.ibm.icu.text.SimpleDateFormat createFormat(String id, Locale locale, String pattern)
      The createFormat method creates SimpleDateFormat.
      Parameters:
      id - unique id that is part of the name of the profile properties
      locale - Locale, language of calendar new Locale("en", "US")
      pattern - date format "yyyy-MMM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss"
      Returns:
      SimpleDateFormat
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null or empty

      Returns:

      Throws:

    • calculateOffset

      public static String calculateOffset(ZoneId zone1, ZoneId zone2)
      The calculateOffset method calculates offset between two time-zones and returns it as a string time with (±00:00) format.
      Parameters:
      zone1 - ZoneId reference zone
      zone2 - ZoneId function zone
      Returns:
      offset as a String with (+HH:mm) format
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if zone1 or zone2 is null

    • toSecond

      public static int toSecond(String time)
      The toSecond method converts string time with ISO format (HH:mm:ss) or (+HH:mm) to second.
      Parameters:
      time - anytime with (HH:mm:ss) or (+HH:mm) format
      Returns:
      seconds as an int value
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if time is null or empty, or it does not have valid format
